title: Astronaut Scott Kelly tweets picture of Hurricane Patricia...
text:
If you are unclear of just how massive Hurricane Patricia is, astronaut Scott Kelly might be able to offer some perspective.
On Friday, the Category 5 Hurricane became the most powerful hurricane ever measured in the Western Hemisphere.
>> Read more trending stories
History's most destructive hurricanes Kelly, commander of the International Space Station and record holder for the longest amount of time spent in space, is both very active and extremely popular on social media. Within a few hours of posting, the below tweet had been retweeted over 12,000 times.
Hurricane #Patricia looks menacing from @space_station . Stay safe below, #Mexico . #YearInSpace pic.twitter.com/6LP2xCYcGD
— Scott Kelly (@StationCDRKelly) October 23, 2015 Hurricane #Patricia approaches #Mexico . It's massive. Be careful! #YearInSpace pic.twitter.com/F5LgnjOjey
— Scott Kelly (@StationCDRKelly) October 23, 2015
